name: Metempsychosis (itch) (Saschanian)
description:
Bug Disclaimer: After performing the third ritual, the crystal bugs out and can´t be used to power the furnace! The end can not be achieved.

Metempsychosis is a small game made for the Mini Jam 110. You take the role of a desperate father trying to resurrect his son. After absolving rituals and rebuilding the old dungeon he manages to perform a big ritual. But does it give him satisfaction?
